recent_changes: Implemented Data Capture model: Sequences, Biofeedback, Learning Targets, Outcomes, Reflections
Added DataSyncService to export sequences for AI analysis
Updated Database schema with sequences table and sequence_id in activity_log
Added thumbnail, description, tags, and date columns to Screenshots table
Implemented sheet-based preview on table row selection
next_priorities: Add double-click to open screenshot in Finder
Column-based sorting for the new Screenshots table
context_message: Hey! You're picking up SolUnified. We just swapped the Screenshots grid for a dense Table view to improve utility. Selection now triggers a detail sheet with the image preview. Focus on keeping the 'Brutalist' aesthetic: high contrast, functional, no fluff. Speed to iterate is everything.
